root.body: Instead of throwing your trash away, see what items you can recycle. Recycled garbage can be transformed and made into new products lessening the amount of resources used to make other products.
Worms cool. Dirt cool. Scrap cool. If you compost, you'll be cool too!
Fresher. Less packaging. Less travel. Hit up your local farmers' market today!
Be like VSCO girls and say goodbye to one-use plastic!
